attributes.action: Oblige BT to pay the sum of £10 to every subscriber who receives an unsolicited telephone call once the subscriber has signed up to the telephome preference service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: BT should accept that they have a responsibility for the use of their communication equipment and they have failed to provide adequate protection to their customers to stop cold calling and other nuisance calls from a variety of sources. BT now need to be forced to accept responsibility and pay a penalty for wasting their customers time, causing them distress and failing to provide adequate facilities for the prevention of these calls.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
